exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
exercises.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart, squat down as if sitting back into a chair, keeping your weight on your heels. Return to standing position.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Push back to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Start in a push-up position, but with your weight on your forearms instead of your hands. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Reach one arm across your chest, using your other hand to gently press the arm towards your body. Switch sides and repeat.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with one leg extended and lean forward, reaching towards your toes. Switch legs and repeat.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Kneel on the floor, sit back on your heels, and lean forward, extending your arms in front of you with palms on the floor.

exercises.name: Biceps Curl
exercises.description: Take a dumbbell of your comfort and then lift it towards you.
